glossdef.para: The process begins when one of the entry criteria is satisfied.
The Software Requirements have been partially or fully completed.
The Function Specification requires revision for changes to the Software Requirements or for changes from increment specification, development, or certification.

formalpara.title: Entry work products and the following supporting work products are available
formalpara.para: The Engineering Chang eLog describes proposed changes, if any. The Usage Specification, if any, is used as a check on the completeness and consistency of the Function Specification.
